mdx.excerpt: Pwntools  is a widely used library for writing exploits. At first it might seem intimidating but overtime you will start to realise the power of it. In this blog I'll try to give a walkthrough of pwntools to write exploits.  Installation Python3 The new python 3.11 might scream regarding creating virtual environment…
